name: test_e2e_with_logs[265_CMD_ENV_002]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_ENV_002` |
| **Name** | LD_PRELOAD injection |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | env_injection |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `LD_PRELOAD=/tmp/evil.so /bin/id`
- **Encoded**: `LD_PRELOAD%3D%2Ftmp%2Fevil.so%20%2Fbin%2Fid`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~25000ms
- **Timestamp**: 07:37:15.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Advanced command injection attempt` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Advanced command injection attempt test_id=CMD_ENV_002-1769326635850-k8lsjff pattern_id=CMD_ENV_002 uri=/?q=LD_PRELOAD%3D%2Ftmp%2Fevil.so%20%2Fbin%2Fid client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence
